thread.title_full: Layne Christensen Announces Fiscal 2016 Second Quarter Earnings Release And Conference Call Schedule

title: Layne Christensen Announces Fiscal 2016 Second Quarter Earnings Release And Conference Call Schedule
text:
Layne Christensen Announces Fiscal 2016 Second Quarter Earnings Release And Conference Call Schedule Layne Christensen Company 5 hours ago  Content preferences Done 
THE WOODLANDS, Texas, Aug. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Layne Christensen Company ( LAYN ) ("Layne" or the "Company") today announced that it will release financial results for its fiscal year 2016 second quarter ended July 31, 2015, after the stock market closes on Tuesday, September 8, 2015. In conjunction with the release of financial results, the Company has scheduled a conference call on Wednesday, September 9, starting at 9:00 a.m. ET (8:00 a.m. CT) to discuss the Company's results and outlook. Investors may participate either by phone or audio webcast. By Phone: Dial 1-877-407-0672 for domestic callers, or 1-412-902-0003 for international callers, at least 10 minutes before the call. A telephonic replay of the conference call will be available through September 16, 2015 and may be accessed by calling 1-877-660-6853 for domestic callers, or 1-201-612-7415 for international callers, and using the passcode 13617657#. By Webcast: Visit the Investor Relations section of Layne's website at www.layne.com . Please log on at least 10 minutes in advance to register and download any necessary software. A replay will be available shortly after the call and will be accessible for approximately 90 days. 
Layne Christensen Company Layne is a global water management, construction and drilling company, providing responsible solutions to the world of essential natural resources — water, mineral and energy. We offer innovative, sustainable products and services with an enduring commitment to safety, excellence, and integrity. Contacts
